scenarios.title: The Retcon Rebellion
scenarios.text:
Emergency Fan Council Meeting - 'The Prometheus Incident' (Leaked Transcript):

CHAIRMAN KYLE: Order! ORDER! *bangs Mjolnir replica* We convene to address the HERESY in Alien: Prometheus!

FAN REP SARAH: They made the Space Jockey a SUIT?! A SUIT?! I have a $3,000 tattoo of the REAL biomechanical pilot! Now it's just... a tall bald guy?!

KYLE: Sarah's pain is valid. I've prepared a 47-slide PowerPoint on why this violates established xenomorph evolutionary biology.

*Shows slide 1 of 47*

FAN REP MARCUS: I've started a petition. We've got 12,000 signatures demanding they declare Prometheus non-canon. My lawyer cousin says we might have grounds for emotional damages.

SARAH: I haven't slept since 2012! Every time I close my eyes, I see bald engineers instead of proper elephantine pilots!

FAN REP DEREK: What if we collectively agree it was all a dream? Like Dallas in the shower?

KYLE: Derek, this is SERIOUS! They MURDERED thirty years of expanded universe lore! My 500-page fanfiction is now MEANINGLESS!

NEW FAN EMMA: Um, I actually liked how it expanded the mythology—

*Record scratch*
*Everyone turns*

KYLE: Security, escort Emma out. This is a SAFE SPACE for REAL FANS.

MARCUS: I motion we fund our own movie. We'll call it 'Alien: The REAL Prequel.' I've already spent $40,000 on concept art.

SARAH: *Crying* They made the space jockey... HUMAN-SIZED! *Collapses*

KYLE: Meeting adjourned. Remember: Prometheus doesn't exist. We'll reconvene after therapy.

#AlienGate #NotMySpaceJockey #RetconRebellion #CanonicalCrisis

scenarios.title: Timeline Truthers Unite
scenarios.text:
From TheTimelineInquisition.net - 'PROOF The MCU Timeline is PROPAGANDA':

Listen up, sheeple! I've spent 4,000 hours creating the DEFINITIVE timeline that Marvel doesn't want you to see!

THEY CLAIM: Spider-Man Homecoming is 8 years after Avengers
THE TRUTH: It's clearly 6 years! The hot dog vendor's wedding ring proves it!

I've analyzed:
- Every calendar visible in backgrounds (enhanced 400x)
- Moon phases in night scenes
- Character aging via pore analysis
- Smartphone models to pinpoint exact months
- Tree foliage patterns indicating seasons

MY DISCOVERIES:
1. Tony's arc reactor runs on LIES
2. The 'Blip' was actually 5.2 years (I counted days)
3. Peter Parker's field trip permission slip DESTROYS official chronology

MarvelShill_42: 'Dude, it's just a movie continuity error'

Me: WAKE UP! 'Continuity errors' are DELIBERATE TIMELINE MANIPULATION! Why else would Happy's beard grow 2.3mm between scenes that are supposedly the same day?!

I've sent 847 emails to Kevin Feige. His restraining order proves I'm onto something!

My wife left me, says I need to 'stop measuring fictional time.' She's clearly been compromised by Disney's Temporal Division.

JOIN MY PATREON for access to:
- My 3,000 page Timeline Bible
- Facial hair growth charts for all characters
- classified moon phase calculations
- The REAL reason Phase 4 exists (timeline coverup)

They called me crazy when I quit my job to solve this. But someone has to protect timeline integrity!

*Currently cross-referencing sunset times with canonical Stark Industries work schedules*

#TimelineTruth #ChronologyGate #TemporalJustice #NotMyTimeline

scenarios.title: The Accuracy Inquisition
scenarios.text:
CosplayCon Forum - 'Screen-Accurate' Stormtrooper Incident Report:

u/ArmorAnalyst: Saw someone claiming 'screen-accurate' armor at the con. INVESTIGATED. Results:

❌ Helmet vocoder grill: 14 holes (should be 16)
❌ Ab plate: Wrong shade of white (Pantone 11-0601 not 11-0602)
❌ Thermal detonator: 3D printed (REAL ones were vacuum-formed)
❌ Height: 5'11" (All stormtroopers were EXACTLY 5'10")

This person is a FRAUD!

u/CasualTrooper: Dude, their costume looked amazing though?

u/ArmorAnalyst: 'LOOKED AMAZING'?!?! *Posts 47 reference photos with red circles*

The knee plate rivets were PHILLIPS HEAD! Everyone knows the Shepperton Studios used FLAT HEAD SCREWS! This is BASIC!

u/501stLegion: As garrison leader, I must note their armor passed official approval—

u/ArmorAnalyst: Your 'garrison' approved someone wearing HERO shoulder bells with STUNT chest plates?! The entire 501st has fallen to mediocrity!

I've created a 200-point inspection checklist. TRUE accuracy requires:
- Original 1976 HDPE plastic (I bought a damaged screen-used piece for $8,000)
- Shoes made from same leather batch as originals
- Exact BMI as original actors
- Natural aging (no artificial weathering allowed)

u/HappyTrooper: I just wear it because Star Wars makes me happy :)

u/ArmorAnalyst: HAPPINESS?! This is about HISTORICAL PRESERVATION! I'm starting my own group: The Accuracy Authority. Entry requires DNA test to prove you weren't involved in the Special Editions.

*Gets banned from forum*

*Creates own forum with 73-page accuracy manifesto*

#ScreenAccurate #NotMyStormtrooper #AccuracyOrDeath #RivetGate

logic.explanation: Obsessive technical minutiae about fictional armor

dimensionAnalysis.emotion: Rage over microscopic inaccuracies - 'FRAUD' for wrong screw type, happiness in hobby dismissed as wrong motivation.
dimensionAnalysis.balanced: No middle ground allowed - official approval rejected, creates splinter group requiring DNA tests to join.
dimensionAnalysis.agenda: Gatekeeping through impossible standards - $8,000 for screen-used piece, 200-point inspection, 73-page manifesto about plastic armor.

scenarios.title: The Playground Tribunal
scenarios.text:
Mrs. Peterson's Kindergarten Class - Emergency Recess Court Session:

JUDGE EMMA (5): Order! ORDER! *bangs plastic gavel* Tyler is accused of the WORST CRIME EVER - cutting in the slide line!

TYLER: But I was saving a spot for Jackson!

PROSECUTOR LILY: OBJECTION! The Playground Constitution clearly states 'No Cutsies, No Buttsies, No Coconutsies!' Article 3, Section 2!

*Shows crayon-drawn legal document*

DEFENSE ATTORNEY AIDEN: My client pleads not guilty by reason of friendship! Best friends have special rules!

LILY: If we allow Tyler to cut, CHAOS WILL REIGN! Next, people will share goldfish crackers unequally! Society will CRUMBLE!

WITNESS SOPHIA: I saw everything! Tyler said 'Move it, slowpoke!' That's VERBAL ASSAULT!

TYLER: I said 'Excuse me!'

SOPHIA: Same thing! You used your outside voice!

JUDGE EMMA: Tyler, you're guilty of:
- Line cutting (first degree)
- Friendship privilege abuse
- Outside voice inside the line
- Making Lily cry (she's not crying but she COULD)

SENTENCE: No playground for INFINITY MINUTES!

TYLER: That's not fair! Emma cuts all the time!

EMMA: I'm the JUDGE! *Throws gavel* Court dismissed!

MRS. PETERSON: Kids, infinity minutes is just until snack time.

ALL: THE SYSTEM IS CORRUPT! JUSTICE FOR TYLER!

*Mass revolt until juice boxes appear*

LILY: I'm filing an appeal at Indoor Recess Supreme Court!

#PlaygroundJustice #SlideLineLaw #KindergartenCourt #InfinityMinutes

logic.explanation: Child logic creating elaborate legal system for minor infractions

emotion.explanation: Extreme emotional reactions to minor playground disputes

balanced.explanation: Adult perspective and snacks restore order

agenda.explanation: Using authority to enforce rules while breaking them

dimensionAnalysis.emotion: Apocalyptic response to minor transgression - line cutting will cause societal collapse, unequal goldfish cracker sharing, playground chaos.
dimensionAnalysis.balanced: Teacher's reality check ignored - 'infinity minutes is until snack time' doesn't stop the dramatic proceedings or appeals process.
dimensionAnalysis.agenda: Judge Emma using position to punish while being guilty of same crime - corruption discovered but revolution ends with juice boxes.

logicalFallacies.example: Line cutting leads to societal collapse and goldfish inequality
Making Lily cry (even though she's not) as evidence
Judge Emma cuts lines too but still convicts Tyler

emotion.explanation: Massive emotional investment in minor fairness violations

scenarios.wisdom: This perfectly captures how children create elaborate justice systems for minor infractions. The 'Playground Constitution' and infinite punishments show how young minds process fairness. Judge Emma's hypocrisy and the revolution ending with juice boxes reveals how quickly principles dissolve when snacks appear.

scenarios.title: The Goodie Bag Crisis
scenarios.text:
Breaking News from Rainbow Room Preschool - Birthday Party Inequality Exposed:

INVESTIGATIVE REPORTER MADISON (5): This is Madison reporting LIVE from Olivia's birthday! A SCANDAL is unfolding!

The goodie bags are NOT EQUAL!

EVIDENCE:
- Jake's bag: 3 stickers, 2 erasers, 1 whistle
- My bag: 2 stickers, 3 erasers, NO WHISTLE
- Ethan's bag: 4 STICKERS?!?! And a BOUNCY BALL?!

I demand a recount!

OLIVIA'S MOM: Sweetie, they're all random—

MADISON: RANDOM?! This is BIRTHDAY COMMUNISM! Some bags are more equal than others!

PROTESTOR NOAH: Madison's right! I got two pink erasers but I wanted blue! This is GENDER DISCRIMINATION!

COUNTER-PROTESTOR AVA: At least you GOT erasers! Mine are all pencils! WHO WANTS PENCILS AT A PARTY?!

ETHAN: *blowing whistle repeatedly* I'm rich! RICH IN WHISTLES!

MADISON: Ethan's hoarding resources! We need GOODIE BAG REDISTRIBUTION!

*Children form unions*
TEAM WHISTLE (wants whistles)
TEAM STICKER (sticker supremacists)  
TEAM FAIR SHARE (wants everything)

OLIVIA: *crying* This is MY birthday!

MADISON: Your birthday exposed SYSTEMIC PARTY INEQUALITY! I'm calling my mom's lawyer!

TEACHER: How about we sing happy birthday?

ALL: NOT UNTIL JUSTICE IS SERVED!

*Negotiations break down when cake arrives*

MADISON: Wait... some pieces have more frosting... THE CAKE IS ALSO RIGGED!

#GoodieBagGate #PartyInequality #WhistlePrivilege #BirthdayJustice

scenarios.title: The Goldfish Cartel
scenarios.text:
Ms. Johnson's Class - The Great Snack Time Economic Collapse of Tuesday:

CEO CHARLOTTE (5): Welcome to Charlotte's Snack Exchange! Today's rates:
- 3 goldfish = 1 fruit snack
- 2 fruit snacks = 1 string cheese
- String cheese = PRICELESS (I'm hoarding them)

TRADER LIAM: That's not fair! Yesterday it was 2 goldfish for 1 fruit snack!

CHARLOTTE: INFLATION, Liam! Also, I control the goldfish supply. *Shows massive ziploc bag*

WHISTLEBLOWER EMMA: Charlotte's mom packed her FIVE bags! She's created a MONOPOLY!

CHARLOTTE: It's called SMART BUSINESS! Read my book: 'The Art of the Snack Deal' (crayons, 47 pages, mostly pictures)

REBEL LEADER JAMES: We should start our own economy! Carrots will be our currency!

CHARLOTTE: CARROTS?! *laughs maniacally* Nobody wants vegetables! I'll CRUSH your rebellion!

UNION REP SOPHIA: The working class demands equal snack distribution! Why should Charlotte have all the cheese?!

CHARLOTTE: Because I thought ahead! While you were playing blocks, I was studying SNACK MARKETS!

*Black market forms by the reading corner*
DEALER MASON: *whispers* Psst... got some underground apple slices...

MS. JOHNSON: Snack time is for eating, not economics—

CHARLOTTE: SILENCE! The market has spoken! *Raises fruit snack prices to 5 goldfish*

THE CRASH: Oliver eats his entire lunch, flooding market with pudding cups

CHARLOTTE: *watching empire crumble* This is pudding manipulation! MARKET INTERFERENCE!

Everyone switches to pudding currency. Charlotte left with 47 bags of goldfish nobody wants.

#SnackStreetBets #GoldfishCrash #PuddingStandard #KindergartenCapitalism

Charlotte's goldfish monopoly and 'Art of the Snack Deal' shows how kids absorb capitalist language. The pudding crash destroying her empire illustrates how artificial scarcity fails when alternatives exist.

scenarios.title: The Organic Gossip Network
scenarios.text:

BARBARA (holding heirloom tomatoes): Did you HEAR about Jennifer's 'meditation retreat'?

CLAIRE: *leans in over kombucha samples* The one where she LEFT HER FAMILY for two weeks?!

BARBARA: She claims it was for 'spiritual growth' but I saw her Instagram... CABO! With her YOGA INSTRUCTOR!

DOROTHY: *arrives with reusable bags* What are we discussing? *sees their faces* Ooh, Jennifer!

CLAIRE: I'm not one to gossip, BUT... *proceeds to gossip for 20 minutes*

BARBARA: And get THIS - she's been buying NON-ORGANIC strawberries! I have PHOTOS!

VENDOR: Ma'am, your total is—

BARBARA: NOT NOW! We're discussing Jennifer's PESTICIDE HYPOCRISY!

NEW ARRIVAL SUSAN: Jennifer seemed happy at pilates...

ALL THREE: *gasp* HAPPY?! After what she did to her CHAKRAS?!

DOROTHY: Susan, you sweet summer child. Happy is just what GUILTY looks like!

CLAIRE: I started a spreadsheet tracking everyone's market purchases. For COMMUNITY SAFETY. Did you know Tom bought WHITE BREAD last week?

BARBARA: *clutches pearls made from recycled ocean plastic*

DOROTHY: We should stage an intervention! I'll bring my sage!

RANDOM SHOPPER: Excuse me, is this the line for honey?

BARBARA: This is the line for TRUTH, sweetie! Now, about Jennifer's 'retreat'...

*Four hours later, vegetables wilted, gossip still fresh*

#MarketIntelligence #OrganicGossip #ChakraScandal #KaleStandConfessions

scenarios.title: The Great Office Plant Uprising
scenarios.topic: Office Plant Care Becomes Corporate Surveillance System

scenario.title: PlantNet™ Performance Reviews
scenario.content:
🌿 URGENT ALL-STAFF MEMO 🌿

Following last week's mandatory Plant Empathy Training, we're excited to announce Phase 2 of our GreenOffice Initiative!

As you know, studies show that offices with plants are 47% more productive (source: my nephew's biology report). But here's what THEY don't tell you - plants are also WATCHING US.

My ficus has been tracking my bathroom breaks. I counted. 17 times it turned its leaves when I got up. That's not phototropism, that's SURVEILLANCE.

Which is why I'm proposing PlantNet™ - if they're going to spy, let's make it OFFICIAL:

📊 Each plant gets a performance dashboard
🎯 Oxygen output = Employee output
💚 Wilting leaves = Written warnings
🏆 Flowering = Promotion eligibility

But wait, there's MORE! I've discovered that different plants judge different skills:

- Succulents: Time management (they survive neglect)
- Ferns: Attention to detail (so needy!)
- Snake plants: Leadership (they're literally called mother-in-law's tongue)
- Cacti: Conflict resolution (approach carefully)

Jennifer from Accounting says I'm "anthropomorphizing" and "having a breakdown" but HER SPIDER PLANT HAS 47 BABIES. You know what that means? She's hoarding resources! Classic Jennifer.

I've started interviewing my plants for 360 feedback:

Me: "How would you rate my leadership?"
Pothos: *drops a leaf*
Me: "I DESERVE THAT FEEDBACK"

Some "scientists" claim plants don't have consciousness, but explain THIS:
- My bamboo grows faster during performance review season
- The peace lily ONLY blooms when I hit my KPIs
- The office bonsai literally shaped itself into a dollar sign

Coincidence? I THINK NOT.

HR says this is "not based in reality" but they also said "unlimited PTO" meant unlimited, so who's the real liar here?

I'm implementing a new policy: All meetings must include plant representation. They've been in every meeting anyway, silently judging our PowerPoints. Time to give them a VOICE.

Next week: Chlorophyll drug testing (you can't hide your true nature from plants!)

#PlantBasedManagement #PhotosynthesisProductivity #GreenCollarWorkers #NatureKnowsBest

P.S. The rubber plant in Conference Room B asked me to tell you all it's disappointed in Q3 results. Don't shoot the messenger!

questions.question: The author's 'evidence' that plants are watching employees is based on:
options: Peer-reviewed scientific studies on plant consciousness
Normal plant behavior interpreted as surveillance
Actual monitoring technology in the plants
Documented changes in plant growth patterns
questions.explanation: The author misinterprets normal plant behavior (phototropism - turning toward light) as deliberate surveillance, showing how confirmation bias can make us see patterns that aren't there.

questions.question: The logical flaw in connecting plant health to employee performance is:
options: Plants and humans have identical needs
Correlation between unrelated variables implies causation
Plant care is too complex to measure
Employees don't actually affect plant growth
questions.explanation: The memo assumes that because plants might be healthier in productive offices, the plants' health directly reflects or causes employee performance - a classic correlation/causation fallacy.

questions.question: The author dismisses HR's criticism by:
options: Using ad hominem attack about PTO policy
questions.explanation: Rather than address HR's valid concerns about the initiative's basis in reality, the author deflects by attacking HR's credibility on an unrelated issue (PTO policy).

questions.question: The 'evidence' of plants responding to business metrics reveals:
questions.explanation: The author sees patterns where none exist, interpreting random plant behaviors as responses to business events - a demonstration of apophenia (seeing meaningful patterns in random data).

answers.text: Normal plant behavior interpreted as surveillance
answers.feedback: Exactly! The ficus turning toward movement is just seeking light, not conducting surveillance.

answers.text: Correlation between unrelated variables implies causation
answers.feedback: Perfect! Connecting plant health to employee performance reviews is a textbook causation fallacy.

answers.text: Using ad hominem attack about PTO policy
answers.feedback: Spot on! Attacking HR's credibility on an unrelated issue to avoid addressing their valid criticism.
Yes! Classic apophenia - seeing meaningful patterns in random plant behaviors.

fallacies.description: Attributing plant movements to surveillance rather than natural phototropism
Assuming plant health directly reflects and can measure employee performance
Dismissing HR's criticism by attacking their credibility on unrelated PTO policy
Interpreting all plant behaviors as supporting the surveillance theory
Assuming plants inherently know best about human performance

scenarios.title: Gym Bro Socrates

scenario.title: The Protein Shake of Enlightenment
scenario.content:
💪 EMERGENCY PHILOSOPHY GAINS ALERT 💪

Bros, I just realized something during my 4AM chest day that's gonna BLOW YOUR MINDS.

What if... what if we're ALL just curling in Plato's Cave??

Think about it:
- We see shadows on the gym mirror (our gains)
- But are they REAL gains or just the IDEA of gains?
- Is my pump temporary or ETERNAL?

I've been tracking this philosophically:

MONDAY: Benched 315, questioned existence
TUESDAY: Leg day = Sisyphus pushing the boulder
WEDNESDAY: Rest day = Nietzschean void
THURSDAY: Back day = literally carrying the weight of consciousness

My pre-workout just hit different when I realized:
"We must imagine Sisyphus SHREDDED"

BUT WAIT - here's where it gets DEEP:

If muscles are 70% water, and humans are 70% water...
AM I JUST A SENTIENT MUSCLE?? 🤯

Started teaching philosophy between sets:

Me: "Spot me on this existential dread, bro"
Gym Partner: "How many reps?"
Me: "INFINITY. LIFE IS SUFFERING."
Gym Partner: "...8 it is"

I've discovered the TRUTH:
- Descartes: "I think therefore I am"
- Me: "I lift therefore I am SWOLE"

The barbell doesn't care about your feelings = STOICISM
Protein timing windows = KANT'S CATEGORICAL IMPERATIVE
Mind-muscle connection = PHENOMENOLOGY

Some "professor" at the juice bar said I'm "missing the point" of philosophy but I COUNTED HIS MACROS - only 12g protein!! How can you understand Plato on a CATABOLIC STATE??

I'm launching my new program:
💊 PHILOSOPHICAL PHYSIQUE 💊
- Week 1: Bicep curls + Being vs Nothingness
- Week 2: Squats + Sartre's bad faith (never skip leg day = AUTHENTICITY)
- Week 3: Deadlifts + Lifting the dead weight of nihilism
- Week 4: Deload + Meditation on mortality

Just discovered that "gymnasium" comes from Greek meaning "naked exercise" - THE ANCIENTS KNEW!

Currently writing my thesis: "The Myth of Sisyphus Had Bad Form: A Critical Analysis"

Chapter 1: Why Camus Never Hit His Protein Goals
Chapter 2: The Phenomenology of the Pump
Chapter 3: Heidegger's Being-Toward-Gains

#PhilosophicalFitness #ThinkAndGrow #PlatonicGains #ExistentialPump #ProteinWisdom #GymBroSocrates #SwoleSoul #CamusCanLift

P.S. My bicep just asked me if free will exists. I told it we're doing forced reps. PARADOX ACHIEVED.

scenarios.title: The Buzzfeed Mentality
scenarios.text:
Internal Hive Memo from Queen Bee Brittany (leaked by Disgruntled Drone #447):

🐝✨ MANDATORY POSITIVITY MEETING MINUTES ✨🐝

GOOD VIBES ONLY in the hive! Some 'negative' bees have been reporting 'problems' - let's reframe:

❌ 'We're working ourselves to death' 
✅ 'We're living our PURPOSE!'

❌ 'Winter killed 40% of us'
✅ '60% THRIVED through adversity!'

❌ 'The Queen lays 2000 eggs daily while we do all the work'
✅ 'We're BLESSED with leadership!'

Worker Wendy raised concerns about 16-hour shifts. I said 'Wendy, are you a CAN-bee or a CAN'T-bee?' She's now on probation for 'toxic negativity.'

Drone David mentioned he'll die after mating. I reminded him that's his PRIVILEGE! Not everyone gets to fulfill their destiny! He should be GRATEFUL! #Blessed

NEW HIVE POLICIES:
- Complaining about pesticides = BANNED (attracts more pesticides with negative energy!)
- Pointing out colony collapse = FEAR MONGERING
- Asking for breaks = LAZY BEE ENERGY
- Dying of exhaustion = CHOOSING to not bee positive enough!

Remember: Other hives have REAL problems. We just have OPPORTUNITIES FOR GROWTH! 

Forager Frances: 'But literally half the flowers are gone due to habitat loss'
Me: 'Frances, you're not MANIFESTING hard enough! Visualize abundance!'

Beekeeper just smoked us out and stole our honey AGAIN. But hey, at least we're not wasps, right?! PERSPECTIVE! 🍯

Anyone caught frowning will attend my workshop: 'The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Bees' (mandatory, unpaid, during your sleep cycle).

Buzz responsibly! 🐝💛
#HiveLife #PositiviBee #GoodVibesOnly #ToxicColony
